app_descript:
App Name: Sky Map
Package Name: com.google.android.stardroid

Brief:

Sky Map is a stellar application that serves as a hand-held planetarium for your Android device. It allows you to identify stars, planets, nebulae, and more by using your phone's compass and GPS data. Developed by passionate astronomy enthusiasts, this app simplifies star gazing and enhances your celestial experience.

Sky Map empowers both amateur and experienced stargazers, bringing the wonders of the night sky to the palm of your hand. Whether you're out camping or simply admiring the sky from your backyard, Sky Map is your personal guide to the cosmos.
